context:
Ihno awakens in a dark forest. A mysterious figure approaches.

The figure laughs, unfazed by your declaration. "Magic?" it rasps, a glint of amusement in its eyes. It lunges forward, drawing a rusty dagger. Do you attempt to dodge, or stand your ground?
game_memory: Ihno awakens in a dark forest. A mysterious figure approaches.
Ihno: I cast Meteor Crash on the figure.
The figure laughs, unfazed by your declaration. "Magic?" it rasps, a glint of amusement in its eyes. It lunges forward, drawing a rusty dagger. Do you attempt to dodge, or stand your ground?
